summary: Skip setup:upgrade on persistent schema mismatch (broken third-party db_schema.xml)

changes.description: After setup:upgrade completes, re-run setup:db:status. If the schema is still reported as 'not up to date' (e.g. due to a buggy third-party module db_schema.xml), record a marker. Subsequent deploys with the same artifact skip the upgrade cycle (no maintenance mode, no DB backup, no setup:upgrade), saving ~4 minutes per deploy and avoiding unnecessary downtime.
